title: One Dollar Each Eliminates Envy
description: Fair division of $m$ indivisible goods among $n$ agents, where each good has marginal value at most 1 to each agent.
results: For additive valuations, a polytime algorithm to get a balanced EF1 allocation $A$ and a vector $p$ such that $(A, p)$ is EF and $p_i ≤ 1$ for each $i$.
For general monotone valuations, a polytime algorithm (given a value oracle) to get an EF allocation with $≤ 2(n-1)$ subsidy per agent.
